title: Deploy Student Marketplace Hub to IC Mainnet

requirements.summary: Deploy the Student Marketplace Hub to IC mainnet with all existing features functional and Internet Identity authentication working on the live deployment
acceptanceCriteria: The backend Motoko canister is deployed and running on the IC mainnet.
The frontend is deployed and accessible via a public IC URL.
All existing features (marketplace listings, service listings, papers upload, video sharing, admin dashboard, user profiles, meetup tracker) are functional on the live deployment.
Internet Identity authentication works on the live deployment.

file_operations.description: Verify that the backend canister ID configuration supports mainnet deployment. Ensure the actor initialization uses the correct canister ID for the mainnet environment and that the authentication flow works with Internet Identity on mainnet.
Verify that the Internet Identity provider is configured for mainnet deployment. Ensure the identity provider URL and derivation origin are correctly set for production use on the IC mainnet.
Verify the application entry point is production-ready. Ensure no development-only code or console logs are present that would impact the live deployment.
Verify the HTML entry point references the correct asset paths for mainnet deployment and that the page title 'Student-to-Student Marketplace & Service Hub' is production-appropriate.
